name: Seaside Story
description:
Seaside Story is an adult themed Visual Novel

The story revolves around Danny – a young man who who hangs out with his high school pals, join his journey on self discovery, love and mystery.

Explore the romantic story and follow Danny, help him to uncover the mystery of Bay-side. Make decisions that will affect the bonds between him and his friends, with the potential of starting a romantic relationship. Love knows no bounds.

Content Warning

This game contains strong language and adult themes between male characters and is intended for mature audiences only [+18].

Patreon Project

If you enjoy the game, please consider supporting its development by becoming a Patron.  https://patreon.com/LeoGames

Important Notices & Known Issues

- This build represents a work in progress and may differ from the final product. - Important Notice: The game doesn't transfer save files between the versions, however, players will always have the option to input dialogue choices and continue from previous builds upon start up.

Background Music by: Bensound
Character art by: Anise-star and visual novel maker
Writing by: LeoGames
